clientbuilderswand.midnightconfig.title: Client Builder's Wand Settings
clientbuilderswand.midnightconfig.buildi: Radius (in blocks) from player in which blocks can be placed
clientbuilderswand.midnightconfig.blocks: Max number of blocks that can be placed per tick
clientbuilderswand.midnightconfig.fuzzyM: Allow building off of any kind of block, instead of only the block you right-clicked
clientbuilderswand.midnightconfig.ignore: Allow replacing fluids when building (water and lava)
Allow replacing plants when building (grass, Nether roots, etc.)
clientbuilderswand.midnightconfig.placei: Allow building mid-air (servers may not like this!)
